articles.title: How lidar is becoming smart and going beyond just automotive - Embedded
articles.description: Lidar is vital for autonomous vehicles but no longer confined to self-driving cars; we explore the tech and how it is also becoming smarter.
articles.content: The increasing interest in autonomous vehicles has spurred significant developments in lidar technology. These 3D lidar sensors are highly valued for their accurate environmental perception by measur… [+8415 chars]

articles.title: 656-foot asteroid, 4 other space rocks, to pass Earth, NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA, with the help of its advanced telescopes, has revealed that 5 asteroids are set to pass Earth at close distances soon. One of them is more than 600 feet wide! Know their speed, size, distance, and other details.
